casebody.data:
ICON OWNER POOL 3 MIDWEST/SOUTHEAST, L.L.C.
v.
FRANKLIN CTY. BD. OF REVISION. 2017-1346 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 6, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On appellant's motion to consolidate cause with No. 2017-1345 for oral argument. Motion granted. Nos. 2017-1345 and 2017-1346 are consolidated for oral argument only.
